item.title: Moving on to Fish shell (and beyond)
item.description: While chatting with one of my WL colleague, I stumbled upon Fish shell. I immediately liked its autocompletion and extensibility mechanisms. After many years using BASH and ZSH, I therefore decided to move on to this new shell. Unlike the others, it’s not POSIX-compatible. Furthermore, to get (at least) the same functionalities as OhMyZsh, I chose to install StarShip. I will then describe how I moved on and updated my existing tools such as SdkMan.
